content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/02/data/2019.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [result]

    
SELECT
     TOP 10 *
 FROM
     OPENROWSET(
         BULK 'https://datalakevipaiva.dfs.core.windows.net/files/labs-dp-203/02/data/*.csv',
         FORMAT = 'CSV',
         PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
     )
     WITH (
         SalesOrderNumber VARCHAR(10) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
         SalesOrderLineNumber INT,
         OrderDate DATE,
         CustomerName VARCHAR(25) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
         EmailAddress VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
         Item VARCHAR(30) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8,
         Quantity INT,
         UnitPrice DECIMAL(18,2),
         TaxAmount DECIMAL (18,2)
     ) AS [result]
